languages.text:
"Вместе поднимем, эттфатер, мы рог на пиру!
Видеть устал я, как гибнут соратники в схватке!" -
Так отвечал Громогласный Ульфар,
Духа сминая железною хваткой.
Вскрикнул от боли злокозненный Фенриса сын
И морок покинул эттфатера разум".

"'Together, Aett-Vater,
our horns at the feast we'll raise!
My eyes are wearied by the sight
of my companions perishing in battle!'—
so came Ulfar Thunderlung's reply,
the spirit's iron grip breaking.
In agony, the malign son of Fenris cried out
and the fog fled
from the Aett-Vater's mind."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
「”アエット＝ヴァテルよ
共に饗宴の角笛を吹こう！
俺の目は戦場で滅びゆく仲間を見て
あまりに疲れてしまった！”ーー
ウルファー・サンダーラングはそう答えて
精霊の鉄の掌握が緩められた。
フェンリスの邪悪な息子は苦痛のあまり叫び
霧は徐々に
アエット＝ヴァテルの心から晴れていった」
languages.original_text:
"'Together, Aett-Vater,
our horns at the feast we'll raise!
My eyes are wearied by the sight
of my companions perishing in battle!'—
so came Ulfar Thunderlung's reply,
the spirit's iron grip breaking.
In agony, the malign son of Fenris cried out
and the fog fled
from the Aett-Vater's mind."

アエット＝ヴァテルの心から晴れていった」

languages.text:
“‘一起上，狼领，
在凯旋的盛宴上举酒共饮！
我已厌倦看到战友们
葬身于这场悲惨的战斗’——
乌尔法·雷狼的回答，
击碎了邪灵的钳制。
芬里斯的孽子发出，
痛苦的哀号，
狼领脑海中的迷雾也云散烟消。”
languages.original_text:
"'Together, Aett-Vater,
our horns at the feast we'll raise!
My eyes are wearied by the sight
of my companions perishing in battle!'—
so came Ulfar Thunderlung's reply,
the spirit's iron grip breaking.
In agony, the malign son of Fenris cried out
and the fog fled
from the Aett-Vater's mind."

languages.text:
« "Ensemble, aett-vater,
nos cornes nous lèverons au festin !
Las sont mes yeux de voir périr au combat
mes infortunés compagnon !"
Ainsi répondit Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre
en se libérant du joug de l'esprit.
Un cri de souffrance s'éleva du fils de Fenris
et dans l'esprit de l'aett-vater
le brouillard s'estompa. »
languages.original_text:
"'Together, Aett-Vater,
our horns at the feast we'll raise!
My eyes are wearied by the sight
of my companions perishing in battle!'—
so came Ulfar Thunderlung's reply,
the spirit's iron grip breaking.
In agony, the malign son of Fenris cried out
and the fog fled
from the Aett-Vater's mind."

« "Ensemble, aett-vater,

Ainsi répondit Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre

Un cri de souffrance s'éleva du fils de Fenris
et dans l'esprit de l'aett-vater
le brouillard s'estompa. »

languages.text:
«"¡Juntos, Aett-Vater,
los cuernos alzaremos en el festín!
¡Mis ojos están cansados
de ver a mis compañeros muertos en batalla!".
Tal fue la respuesta de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador,
doblegando el agarre férreo del espíritu.
En agonía, el hijo maligno de Fenris gritó
y la niebla abandonó
la mente de{mf|l| la} Aett-Vater».
languages.original_text:
"'Together, Aett-Vater,
our horns at the feast we'll raise!
My eyes are wearied by the sight
of my companions perishing in battle!'—
so came Ulfar Thunderlung's reply,
the spirit's iron grip breaking.
In agony, the malign son of Fenris cried out
and the fog fled
from the Aett-Vater's mind."

languages.text:
"'Gemeinsam, Aett-Vater,
werden wir beim Festmahl unsere Hörner erheben!
Meine Augen sind müde des Anblicks
meiner Gefährten, die im Kampf sterben!'
So lautete Ulfar Donnerlunges Antwort,
den eisernen Griff des Geists brechend.
Vor quälenden Schmerzen schrie der böse Sohn von Fenris auf
und der Nebel floh
aus dem Verstand des Aett-Vaters."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
"'Birlikte Aett-Vater,
ziyafetimizde boynuzlarımızı kaldıracağız!
Gözlerim kapanmıştı hakikate,
yoldaşlarımın savaşta kayboluşunu görmekten!'
Ulfar Tufanciğer gecikmedi cevabında,
ruhun demir kavrayışını kırdı geçti.
Fenris'in kötü oğlu acıyla feryat etti
ve dağıldı sisler,
Aett-Vater'ın zihnindeki."
languages.original_text:
